flawed_nl_solution:
Richard has scored 84 touchdowns because 14 x 6 = <<14*6=84>>84
To beat the record he must score 86 touchdowns because 89 + 1 = <<86=86>>86
He needs 2 more touchdowns to beat the record because 86 - 84 = <<2=2>>2
He has 2 games left because 16 - 14 = <<16-14=2>>2
He needs to average 1 touchdowns a game to beat the record because 2 / 2 = <<2/2=1>>1
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 86. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
